name: Lemons and Catnip
description:
Description

Help a sweet old lady escape her balcony after she’s been locked outside by her judgemental cat.

You can grow plants and make friends with wasps along the way.

We’ve been wanting to try out making games together, and this is our first attempt.

Controls
  • Left click: interact & pick up
  • Right click: examine & release
Hints

Stuck with the hidden achievement? It might be a little stupid... if you get frustrated, we have a hint here: https://ibb.co/30vXfSZ

A game by Kristian Setälä & Saara Honkanen
